text: @realDonaldTrump Reading this between patients in a busy hospital makes me furious.  A coronavirus pandemic is a Biblical event.  Millions may die if we don't proceed with caution.  Listen to the professionals and stay the fuck home until we give the All Clear sign. Trump doesn't care.  He lies.

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
